professional_summary: Career-minded and certified IT professional with strong communication and analytical skills, capable of quickly adapting to different environments.

key_responsibilities: Troubleshooting calls for all residential Optimum products.
Documenting troubleshooting steps using the Remedy ticketing system.
Educating customers through established troubleshooting procedures.
Prepared reports for quarterly budget meetings.
Authored professional correspondence to customers and vendors.
Researched the latest tech to improve service departments' proficiency.
Rapidly learned and mastered various computer programs.
